author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Ferocious, a first-person dinosaur survival action game developed by OMYOG. Players will end up stranded on a dangerous island full of threats and sights to take in. Engage with deadly mercenaries and even deadlier dinosaurs using an arsenal of weapons to live to tell the tale. Ferocious is available now for PC (Steam).

#Ferocious #Gaming #IGN
title: Ferocious - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at 'The Eye Has Opened' Trailer for Luna Abyss, a first-person narrative-driven action bullet hell shooter developed by Bonsai Collective. Players will embody Fawkes, a prisoner who's caught between two fates and left with a single task of recovering forgotten technology from within the Abyss and all it consumed in the process. Engage in energetic, fast-paced combat with a suite of weapons across dark and vibrant environments in Luna Abyss, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Luna Abyss - Official 'The Eye Has Opened' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
PlayStation and J.J. Abrams' Bad Robot Games have announced a new multiplayer game as part of the companies' partnership. While PlayStation's multiplayer-centric offerings have not hit as of late (except Helldivers 2), there is hope that this game will find an audience considering it's being helmed by Left 4 Dead's Mike Booth. In other news, Amazon's Tomb Raider series is not only rebooting the live-action Lara Croft adventures, but will "reinvent the franchise on a massive scale" by connecting the show to the games in a "unified storytelling universe." Fleabag's Phoebe Waller-Bridge is showrunning, and the series is expected to go into production early next year. And finally, Creative Assembly hosted a 25th Anniversary showcase, featuring new Total War projects, including the next mainline historical game: Total War: Medieval 3. A new game engine, Warcore, will also power new entries on console for the first time.
title: PlayStation Partners with J.J. Abrams’ Bad Robot For New Game from Left 4 Dead Dev - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Splitgate: Arena Reloaded, a return to form for the hit first-person free-to-play arena-based multiplayer shooter developed by 1047 Games. Players will experience a redefined yet reminiscent Splitgate experience, from core combat, UI design, the removal of factions and abilities, and more. Splitgate: Arena Reloaded is also fitted with a rebuilt progression system, 5 new, 6 fully-reworked maps, 3 new Primary Weapons, and 1 new Power Weapon to reign chaos on the enemy. Splitgate: Arena Reloaded is launching on December 17 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Game Store, Windows).

#SplitgateReloaded #Gaming #IGN
title: Splitgate: Arena Reloaded - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Apple Arcade Launch Trailer for PowerWash Simulator, the hit powerwashing simulation game developed by Futurlab. Players will be able to take the satisfying gameplay of cleaning dirty environments on the go to put their trusty tools to good use. PowerWash Simulator is available now for Apple Arcade for iOS, macOS, and Apple TV.

#IGN #gaming
title: PowerWash Simulator - Official Apple Arcade Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Samson: A Tyndalston Story announcement trailer for the upcoming pressure-driven action experience built around debt, consequences, and survival in one of the most unforgiving cities imaginable. Samson: A Tyndalston Story will be available on Steam and Epic Games in early 2026. 

Take on the role of Samson McCray, a man fighting to stay ahead of a crushing debt that tightens by the hour. Violence, desperation, and quick judgment are the only tools he has left as Tyndalston pushes back at every turn. Combat is grounded, physical, and dangerous. The city responds to your actions, forcing you into a loop where pressure defines every choice you make.

#Samson #Gaming #IGN
title: Samson: A Tyndalston Story - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Springs, Eternal announcement trailer for the upcoming game from developer Fullbright (creator of Gone Home and Tacoma). Springs, Eternal is a lo-fi, first-person compact narrative exploration game set within a mysterious hot spring in the dead of night. Springs, Eternal will be available on PC via Steam in 2026. 

In Springs, Eternal players explore the dark, winding, wooded paths of Stillwater Springs, a secluded, dreamlike and eerie retreat nestled deep amongst the fog-shrouded pines - an otherworldly location that is equally inviting as it is unsettling.

As they tread and illuminate the trail, flashlight in hand, players will begin to piece together the humanistic and deeply heartfelt memory of the romantic relationship that brought them here, and perhaps discover where it will lead them next.

Along the way, they’ll encounter a varied and unique cast of other lost souls, each with their own reasons for being at Stillwater: the philosophers engaging in a debate
title: Springs, Eternal - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Hello Sunshine is a mystery survival game set in the ruins of a corporate empire. Explore the world and get a new peek at Hello Sunshine in this latest trailer. Walk in the shadow of a giant robot during the sweltering days; stay close to keep warm during the cold nights. Scavenge, craft, upgrade — and piece together the broken puzzle of a world ruled by machines that refuse to shut down. Hello Sunshine will be available on PC, and sign-ups for the Steam Playtest are available now.
title: Hello Sunshine - Official Playtest Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 story trailer for this upcoming real-time strategy game to learn more about the story campaign, co-written by legendary Black Library author John French. The story trailer marks the return of Captain Cyrus and the Blood Ravens to Kronus, the world they’ve sworn to defend, after the events of the Dark Crusade. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 will be available on PC in 2026. 

The galaxy lies shattered. Kronus stands in ruin. The Blood Ravens stand defiant. Ork Warlords infest the surface, Mechanicus Priests scour the ruins in pursuit of knowledge long forgotten. And buried deep below, an ancient horror stirs. Buried for eons and never meant to return.

But they are not alone. In their hour of greatest darkness The Dark Angels answer their call.

The future is untold, while the fate of Kronus lies in the balance. Only one thing is certain… WAR HAS RETURNED TO KRONUS!

#Warhammer40KDawnOfWar4 #Gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
What are you waiting for, Troopers? Do you want to live forever?! General Johnny Rico is back, and he’s calling on you to do your part! Check out the Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War! announcement trailer for this upcoming first-person retro shooter game. Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War! will be available on Steam, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Nintendo Switch 2 in early 2026. 

Take up the trusty Morita rifle, pledge your allegiance to the Federation, and join the most realistic depiction of warfare you’ll find. Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War! is an authentic retro FPS experience, a devastating anti-bug arsenal, over 30 iconic weapons and items, sharply loyal story and starring General Johnny Rico himself.

#StarshipTroopersUltimateBugWar #Gaming #IGN
title: Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War! - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Haddonfield Heights is a neighborhood that houses a dark history. Some residents try to forget the horrors that occurred on Halloween night in 1963. Others gather at the Haddonfield water tower to share the twisted tale of Lampkin Lane. Take a tour of Haddonfield Heights in this latest Halloween trailer for the upcoming asymmetric stealth horror game with single and multiplayer modes. Halloween will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on September 8, 2026.

#Halloween #Gaming #IGN
title: Halloween - Official Haddonfield Heights Map Flythrough Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take another look at the world and gameplay of The Relic: First Guardian in this new trailer for the upcoming dark fantasy action RPG. The Relic: First Guardian will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, and Steam in early 2026. Guardian, gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness.
title: The Relic: First Guardian - Official 'The Family Left Behind' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this trailer for When Sirens Fall Silent, a dark, investigative, psychological thriller where you play as Mila, a determined policewoman in early 1990s Italy. Mila is thrown into a high-profile case of violent kidnappings and murders. Haunted by her own traumatic memories, Mila must unravel the mystery at the heart of these crimes and not lose herself to the darkness. 

When Sirens Fall Silent is the latest game from LKA Games, the developers of The Town of Light and Martha Is Dead. Their latest effort promises to push the technical boundaries and introduce a branching, multi-layered narrative dialogue system, with a huge focus on verbal and emotional interaction. 

For more information about When Sirens Fall Silent as it becomes available, stick with IGN!

#IGN #WhenSirensFallSilent  #Thriller
title: When Sirens Fall Silent - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Hide your flag. Find the enemy flag. Run it back, then defend for a minute to win it. Check out the latest Last Flag trailer for this fast-paced 5v5 shooter game with showstopping contestants, set in a televised competition where strategy, teamwork, and chaos blend in the ultimate game of Capture the Flag. The latest Last Flag trailer shows what you can expect from the game as the Blue Team lays out their solid plan. Last Flag will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam from December 4 to December 7, 2025.
title: Last Flag - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Robosen's Transformers Soundwave robot trailer for the latest Transformers robot from the team at Robosen in collaboration with Hasbro. The trailer gives a deep dive into Robosen's Soundwave's features. Soundwave is a fully auto-converting robot, and this Decepticon spy comes to life with cutting-edge technology and a nostalgic design, including life-like actions and sinister commands. Soundwave is also a functional Bluetooth speaker while in cassette mode, with the ability to stream music, with skip through, pause, and play all with Soundwave's front facing retro tape deck buttons. There is also an integrated recording feature. The original G1 voice of Soundwave, Frank Welker, returns with over 200+ recorded lines for Robosen's Soundwave. Robosen's Soundwave also includes articulating hip-joints, 84 high-performance chipsets and 28 precision-built servo motors. 

Robosen’s Flagship Soundwave, the second Decepticon collectible within the range, is now available for p
title: Robosen's Transformers Soundwave Robot - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Attack on Titan Gameplay Launch Trailer for Brawlhalla, the hit platform-based fighting game developed by Blue Mammoth Games and Ubisoft. Players can get a look at iconic Attack on Titan characters in action with Eren, Mikasa, and Levi joining the fight with new modes to play alongside a new map called Shiganshina District. The Attack on Titan collaboration for Brawlhalla is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android, and PC.
title: Brawlhalla x Attack on Titan - Official Gameplay Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at an extended version of the announcement trailer for SOL Shogunate, a just-announced single-player, third-person RPG "samurai space opera" from developer Chaos Manufacturing. 

SOL Shogunate follows Yuzuki, the shattered heir of a once-powerful samurai family massacred by a rival clan. Now an outlaw ronin, Yuzuki carves a bloody path of vengeance through the gleaming metropolises of Earth's moon, a world of towering space elevators, bullet trains, and opulent districts where the shogunate elite bask in Earthlike comforts from artificial gravity to simulated night. But… beneath each glittering city, countless workers live and die in service to the shogunate, their labor the unseen engine of its power. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3219360/SOL_Shogunate/
title: SOL Shogunate - Official Extended Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Standoff returns in Black Ops 7 as a fully remastered medium-sized 6v6 map, rebuilt with modern visuals while preserving the iconic layout from Black Ops 2. This classic location – famous in both casual and competitive play – brings back its signature urban chokepoints and long-range sightlines.

The central tower erupts with flames over the Main Road, where the tank and statue overlook intersections connected to the Store, Hostel, House, and Warehouse. Each building offers second-story vantage points for locking down lanes. Stick close to the stone walls near the tower to stay out of sight, or push the outer routes toward the Gas Station and Graveyard Alley to flank your opponents. Watch the full 4K 60FPS gameplay as we revisit this fan-favorite battleground in its sharpest form yet.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 – Standoff Remastered (Sticks & Stones) Season 1 Gameplay | 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Octopath Traveler 0 is available now on Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S and PC via Windows and Steam. Watch the Octopath Traveler 0 launch trailer for this turn-based RPG prequel. Set on the continent of Orsterra, this is a tale of restoration and retribution involving the divine rings. Create your own character and build your own town in this Octopath Traveler prequel.

#IGN #gaming
title: Octopath Traveler 0 - Official Live Action Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN
title: Get to know Octopath Traveler 0, available now on PC and console. Presented by @squareenixna

author: IGN
description:
Enter Fate, a brand-new small-sized 6v6 map that pulls David back into a warped memory shaped by fear, guilt, and the legacy of Raul Menendez. This surreal reimagining of Menendez’s Nicaraguan compound twists reality into impossible shapes, with giant machetes slicing through the sky and fragments of the world suspended in midair.

Built on a floating landmass, Fate features a tight three-lane layout with fast routes through the Courtyard and Church. Outer lanes drop into nothingness, but portals let you instantly shift between key areas to stay in the fight. Watch as we break down this mind-bending arena and its rapid, high-pressure engagements in full 4K 60FPS.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 – Fate Map (6v6 Domination) Season 1 Gameplay | 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'What is Immortal Empires?' Overview Trailer for Total War: Warhammer 3, a turn-based strategy game developed by Creative Assembly and Feral Interactive. 

Players will get the rundown on the ultimate sandbox campaign uniting all three Warhammer games on one complete map with up to 100 factions to wage war with. Immortal Empires is available now for Total War: Warhammer 1, Total War: Warhammer 2, and Total War: Warhammer 3 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #TotalWarWarhammer3 #TotalWar
title: Total War: Warhammer 3 - Official 'What is Immortal Empires?' Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Total War is going back to the medieval era. Watch the Total War: Medieval 3 announcement trailer for the next installment in the strategy game series. 

Total War Medieval 3 is currently in early development.

#IGN #TotalWarMedieval3 #TotalWar
title: Total War: Medieval 3 - Official Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Step into Astra Malorum, the latest Black Ops 7 Zombies map, as the heroes continue their hunt for the next Shadowsmith. Set aboard a mysterious early 20th-century observatory drifting among Saturn’s rings, this haunting location blends cosmic beauty with eerie danger.

Once a center of human discovery, the abandoned observatory now floats in silence, its rusted domes and fractured telescopes keeping watch over the planet’s swirling bands. Explore hollow corridors, uncover hidden secrets, and face new challenges as you progress through this atmospheric chapter of the Zombies saga. Watch the full 4K 60FPS gameplay and see the mysteries of Astra Malorum revealed.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 – Astra Malorum Zombies Map Gameplay (Season 1) | 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for The Internship, an action thriller distributed by Paramount Global Content Distribution. Sins of the past are forced to the light to be accounted for in the true story of The Internship, releasing Digital on January 13, 2026.

A ruthless, highly trained assassin, raised from childhood in a top-secret CIA program known only as The Internship, is ready to dismantle the institution that stole her youth. Assembling her fellow interns, she leads a bloody uprising – forcing the CIA to unleash equally lethal force to stop them.

The Internship stars Lizzy Greene, Megan Boone, Sky Katz, Philip Winchester, Alix Villaret, Ollie Roddy, Sullivan Stapleton, and more. The film is directed by James Bamford and written by J.D. Zeik. 

The Internship is releasing Digital on January 13, 2026.
title: The Internship - Official Trailer (2026) Lizzy Greene, Megan Boone, Sky Katz

author: IGN
description:
Step into Utopia, a brand-new medium-sized 6v6 map built for fast, vertical combat. Once a cutting-edge Guild research facility, this futuristic complex now operates as a key site for Project Synapse under Alden Dorne. Its mix of sleek interior labs, exposed high-rise walkways, and a loose three-lane layout creates plenty of opportunities for parkour movement, Wall Jumps, and creative engagements.

Explore standout locations like the Display Home, the Restaurant and Garden Statue, and the central Showroom, showcasing a cross-section of the city. Outer lanes trace the edge of the skyline, where one wrong step will drop you from this luxurious perch above the clouds. Watch the full gameplay showcase here as we show the map’s flow, combat spaces, and standout design elements.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 – Utopia Map (6v6 Team Deathmatch) Season 1 Gameplay | 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Octopath Traveler 0 is all about forging your own path. As the name suggests, your custom protagonist starts from "zero" and can spend time rebuilding their hometown of Wishvale, recruiting from over 30 companions, learning skills, and battling powerful foes. But where should you start? Whether you're familiar with the Octopath series or you're exploring Orsterra for the first time, we've got 10 key tips to make the most of your journey.

0:00 - Intro
0:39 - Don't Stress About Your Early Choices
1:53 - Strategize With Your Party Formation
3:40 - Find Enemy Weaknesses Quickly
5:58 - Helpers Can Get You Through a Tough Boss Fight
7:03 - Boosted Abilities Enhance Their Properties
7:40 - Take Advantage of Food Effects
8:13 - Rebuilding Wishvale Makes You Stronger
9:35 - Build Special Structures in Your Town
10:02 - Character Mastery Lets You Refine Your Party
10:50 - Get a Ship for Free!
title: Octopath Traveler 0: 10 Essential Tips to Get Started

author: IGN
description: Have fun with this six-minute High on Life 2 boss fight gameplay video where you battle against Kreg Button, a pirate-themed bounty hunter. You'll see multiple talking guns in action during this exclusive new chunk of IGN First gameplay from Squanch Games' upcoming comedic first-person shooter sequel. High on Life 2 will be available on February 13, 2026 for PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S (including day one on Xbox Game Pass Ultimate).
title: High on Life 2: Boss Fight Gameplay – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Lords of the End Times DLC Announcement Trailer for Total War: Warhammer 3, a turn-based strategy game developed by Creative Assembly and Feral Interactive. 

Players will face the formidable Nagash, the great necromancer, head-on in an upcoming DLC called Lords of the End Times. Face forces like never before in the Lords of the End Times DLC for Total War: Warhammer 3, launching in Summer 2026 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #TotalWarWarhammer3 #Strategy
title: Total War: Warhammer 3 - Official Lords of the End Times DLC Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tour the lands and see what you can expect from the campaign in this latest Total War: Warhammer 3 - Lords of the End Times trailer for the upcoming DLC for the strategy game. 

Taking inspiration from the lore, you will face a campaign experience transformed, with apocalyptic scenarios and cataclysmic events that push the boundaries of strategy and survival. Nagash reigns in death. Will you allow him to turn this world into his domain? 

The Total War: Warhammer 3 - Lords of the End Times DLC will be available in summer 2026.

#IGN #TotalWarWarhammer3 #Strategy
title: Total War: Warhammer 3 - Lords of the End Times - Official Campaign Fly Over Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Cast Outs announcement trailer for this upcoming modern-fantasy co-op action game from Twisted Works. 

Urban fantasy collides with true co-op as you and your crew unleash visceral physical magic, amplify each other’s powers, and push back invaders in the fight to save your city: a reimagined London infused with myth and magic. Cast Outs will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC via Steam.

#IGN #CastOuts #Action
title: Cast Outs - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Discoveries lead to deeper unknowns, the only way to go is forward. Watch the Routine launch trailer for this first-person sci-fi horror game. 

Set in a retro-analogue future inspired by 80s technology, Routine tasks players with exploring the lunar base in search of answers as to why the base has gone quiet, putting them face to face with an enemy who is certain that they are the main threat. But the discoveries they make will only lead to deeper unknowns. 

Routine is available now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud, and Steam.

#IGN #Routine #Horror
title: Routine - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to Surf City! Watch the Fortnite Reload Chapter 7 gameplay trailer for a peek at what you can expect.

#IGN #FortniteReload #BattleRoyale
title: Fortnite Reload - Official Chapter Seven Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 1 Story Cinematic Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest addition to the first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

Players will witness the rise of a new threat as Alden Dorne continues his ruthless climb to power. Season 1 of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #CallOfDuty #BlackOps7
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Season 1 Story Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Terminator 2D: No Fate is the latest attempt to gamify one of the best action movies of all time, and there have been quite over the years. So, let’s travel back in time and examine some of the many games that have been based on (and inspired by) this franchise, from the earliest console games, arcade classics, and how James Cameron’s seminal time travel franchise helped lay the groundwork for Bethesda Softworks later successes like Skyrim and Fallout 3. Plus, how have the more recent movies been interpreted in games? 

Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines got some official tie-ins, Terminator: Salvation took the assignment seriously with a totally original game prequel, Terminator: Genesys had a mobile game with none of the action the series is known for, and Terminator: Dark Fate kicked off a long line of Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Robert Patrick guest appearances, from the T-800 in Gears of War to Sarah Connor in Fortnite to the T-1000 in Mortal Kombat 1. Meanwhile, a
title: The Best, Worst and Weirdest Terminator Games

author: IGN
description:
Do not mistake faith for kindness. Let it be the unyielding strength to grind the Ruin into dust. See Undertake in action in this latest Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows trailer for this expansion to the multiplayer action soulslike RPG. 

Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows is available now on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #EldenRingNightreign #TheForsakenHollows
title: Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows - Official Undertaker Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, the latest addition to the first-person action-adventure series developed by Retro Studios. Players will embark on another daring adventure as Samus Aran to a hostile planet with new allies to accompany her on her mission to dispatch enemies, overcome challenges, and search for a way home. Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is available now for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#MetroidPrime4Beyond #Gaming #IGN
title: Nintendo Unveils the Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Launch Trailer, Will You Be Playing?

author: IGN
description:
Greedfall 2 takes cues from the early-2000s era of roleplaying games. It's more like Dragon Age: Origins or Knights of the Old Republic than anything released recently, for better and for worse. I distinctly got the feeling that Greedfall 2 is specifically harkening back to this era of games for a reason: This is a style of game that the developers at Spiders want to emulate and keep alive because they prefer it—at least for their own games. We took it for one last test drive ahead of its 1.0 launch. Previewed by Jonathan Bolding.

#Greedfall2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Greedfall 2: The Dying World Is an Old-School RPG That Harkens Back to KOTOR and Dragon Age 1

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from podcast Beyond Episode 924, Max and Brian look into the latest GTA 6 leaks and why a game all about stealing cars even needs to have rental bikes in the first place. Beyond! 

This weeks show is Max Scoville, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: GTA 6 Leak Suggests Car-Stealing Game Will Also Let You Rent a Bicycle - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out our gameplay of Routine, an ultra-realistic sci-fi horror game which sees you exploring an abandoned lunar base. 

In Routine, you'll contend with zero waypoint markers and instead, observe your surroundings in the hopes that the killer enemy robots don't find you first.

Routine releases December 4th for PC (Steam) and Xbox Series X|S and is Day 1 on Xbox Game Pass. 

#IGN #Routine #Horror
title: Routine: Ultra Realistic Horror Gameplay in Space

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest trailer for Replaced, a 2.5D narrative driven action-platformer! 

Set in an alternate history 1980s America, after a nuclear disaster has devastated the land. You play R.E.A.C.H, an AI trapped in the body of a human, as they uncover the secrets of the engimatic Phoenix corporation. 

Run, climb and fight your way through this dystopian cyberpunk world with tight and responsive combat. The retro-futuristic world is brought to life in stunning detail, with hand-crafted pixel art, which is enhanced with modern effects to give Replaced its dark and gritty vibe. 

Replaced releases on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store and GOG) and Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox Game Pass on March 12th, 2026.

#IGN #Replaced #ActionPlatformer
title: Replaced - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Project Messiah' Season 5 Cinematic Trailer for The Outlast Trials, a multiplayer first-person survival co-op horror shooter developed by Red Barrels. 

Players will be able to access new content with the clash of traditional folklore horror and high-luxury tourism. Survive the onslaught of Sister Liliya, who hides among mannequins in her cultish compound, as players head to a ski resort hosting a VIP auction where humans are for sale.

Encounter 'Project Messiah' in Season 5 of The Outlast Trials, launching on December 9 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #TheOutlastTrials #Horror
title: The Outlast Trials - Official 'Project Messiah' Season 5 Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Liberate the Magma Worlds' Into the Unjust Trailer for Helldivers 2, the hit third-person action co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. 

Players will be called in the name of controlled democracy to fight back against the menacing Automaton Legion from taking priceless resources from ancient magma worlds. The new Into the Unjust season packs new missions against mechanical threats of all kinds from Bots, Guards, and more. 

Helldivers 2: Into the Unjust is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Helldivers2 #Shooter
title: Helldivers 2 - Official 'Liberate the Magma Worlds' Into the Unjust Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Unlocked 718: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f8hWWb6N_-s

CD Projekt Red has laid out its most ambitious roadmap yet for The Witcher 4, we break down what CDPR revealed and how development is progressing.

#Gaming #Witcher4 #Xbox
title: CD Projekt Red Details Its Vision for The Witcher 4 - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from podcast Beyond Episode 924, Max and Brian also sat down with game director Frederic Gemus of the latest super hero beat-em-up, MARVEL Cosmic Invasion and learned a ton about the games influences, cool easter eggs, and why this spiritual successor to the original '90s beat-em-ups is worth checking out. Beyond! 

This weeks show is Max Scoville, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion Director Talks Roster, Easter Eggs, Tips & More - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
After 8 years of waiting, Metroid Prime 4 Beyond is finally here and playable on both the Nintendo Switch and the Nintendo Switch 2. And with two entire generations of Nintendo consoles to choose from this time around, which version of Samus’ latest adventure looks and runs the best? 

Gameplay captured on a docked Switch 1 and Switch 2
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond - Nintendo Switch 1 & 2 Graphics Comparison

author: IGN
description:
Octopath Traveler 0 is quite different from both Octopath Traveler 1 and 2, and the mobile game, Champions of the Continent, on which its story is based. Let's go over the biggest changes (like 8 player battles, influence, town building, and the 30+ companions), from all these versions that you can expect in this new prequel.

Timecodes:
0:00 - Intro
0:17 - Battle Changes
1:50 - Characters and Structure
3:45 - Town Building
5:10 - Path Actions and Influence
7:04 - Character Mastery and Ultimate Techniques
title: BIGGEST Changes In Octopath Traveler 0 (It's Not What You Think!)

author: IGN
description:
Up until now, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond for Switch 1 has mostly been a mystery in terms of how it looks and runs. Luckily, as part of our Metorid Prime 4: Beyond review process, we were able to go hands-on with the game on the original Nintendo Switch to see how it performs. A mystery no more! Here's the entire first mission of Metroid Prime 4 running on Switch 1.

#IGN #gaming
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond - Switch 1 Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Step into Samus’ visor once again in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond! In this video, we dive straight into the first minutes of gameplay, exploring the opening areas, early combat, and the initial puzzles that set the stage for the adventure ahead. Witness the stunning environments, immersive sound design, and classic Metroid mechanics that define the series.

Captured in 4K on Nintendo Switch 2, this footage gives you a first look at how the game kicks off and what players can expect when they start their journey on planet Tanamaar.
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – First 12 Minutes of Gameplay | Nintendo Switch 2 (Captured in 4K)

author: IGN
description:
Metroid Prime 4 is finally here, giving fans another chance to step into Samus’ visor in an epic first-person adventure. While this latest installment builds on the classic Metroid formula, there are some key tips, tricks, and nuances that can make your playthrough smoother and more rewarding. From early energy tank locations to mastering elemental shots and map markers, we’ve compiled 11 essential things we wish we knew before diving in.

Avoid common mistakes and make the most of your upgrades with these essential tips for Metroid Prime 4. Learn how to find early energy tanks, master elemental shots, explore the desert efficiently, and reactivate scout bots to track collectibles. From boosting your bike effectively to knowing when to free-aim versus lock-on, these strategies will help you tackle enemies and bosses with ease. For more guides, walkthroughs, and secrets, keep it here on IGN.

0:00 Intro
0:50 Scan Everything
1:32 Bumper Jumper
2:08 Early Energy Tanks
3:33 Don’t Skip Gre
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond - 11 Things We Wish We Knew Before Starting

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy this nine-minute gameplay reveal trailer for The God Slayer, the upcoming open-world steampunk fantasy RPG from Pathea Games, creators of the My Time series. It's in development for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. 

The developers describe The God Slayer as follows: "Enter an Eastern-inspired steampunk metropolis where gods known as Celestials reign with a divine fist! In this premium open-world RPG, you are an Elemancer who refuses to bow to his creators. Infused with elemental powers and a heart of vengeance, you will dethrone them all. You will rise to be The God Slayer."

Wishlist The God Slayer on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2536510/
title: The God Slayer - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: The first paid DLC for Elden Ring Nightreign is here! If you've bought the DLC and are wondering how to actually play the new content, here's a quick guide on how to access everything new in the Forsaken Hollows.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows - How to Start the DLC

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Hordeguard: Winds of the North trailer for this upcoming strategy tower defense game. The Hordeguard: Winds of the North trailer shows gameplay and your objectives. In Hordeguard: Winds of the North, gather resources, fortify your village, recruit your warband, and defend against waves of monsters. With the clock ticking, every decision counts – strategize quickly and act swiftly to ensure the survival of your village. Play solo or team up with a friend in local co-op mode. Hordeguarde: Winds ot he North will be available on PC.
title: Hordeguard: Winds of the North - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
New gameplay footage from Resident Evil: Requiem aired on Japanese TV, and showed off some locations we haven't seen yet, but do look a little familiar. While the Spencer Mansion from RE1 is NOT confirmed to be in this game, the interior claustrophobic environment does look similar. In other news, voice actor Jennifer Hale will not be voicing Samus Aran in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond. Hale has voiced the character in the previous three Metroid Prime games. Nintendo has not given a reason for the change, but it has recently switched up the voice talents for other properties, such as Mario and Donkey Kong. And finally, voice actor Briana White, who is the english voice behind Aerith in the FF7 Remake games, wants you to stop tagging her in fan-made smut, you weirdos.
title: New Resident Evil Requiem Gameplay Should Make RE1 Fans Happy - IGN Daily Fix
